title: How to get free Robux - Quora

response.answer_text: All those other people don’t know what they’re talking about. Of course you can. And I will show you how. Make a game w/ game passes.Alright, so you do know that the most popular games with expensive game passes on ROBLOX are made by creators who gain tons of robux each week, right? When you buy a game pass from a game, it sends the robux you spent to the game developer. If you are the developer of a popular game, with game passes, you are very likely to go to your homepage to find out you have a certain amount of Roblox Dollars(Robux. however much you made the gamepass) 2. Make clothing that people can buy You can make T-shirts, Shirts, Pants, and hats(maybe not hats but yeah). once you do, people can buy it and you gain robux from that. 3. Join a giveaway There are groups out there that distribute free robux to accounts. they do this by putting robux into group funds, then they go to “Distribute” and give people robux. Those are the ways to get free robux.The people who said no need to play the game more.

Well I am an OG roblox player and let me disclose this to you.People who play roblox consistently need to get robux (the money) to purchase the things they so want, that is when con artists come in.Scammers range to media (Instagram,Twitter,youtube, and even Facebook), roblox index in the remarks (tho this is near dieing out), generators that "guarantee free robux" however gives you an infection rather, and games.Games work this way, an administrator of roblox (or now and again the roblox account itself) will join the game and individuals (players who don't exist) will make statements like "omg it's roblox, would i be able to get some free robux" and roblox (or any administrator) will answer with a "yes" and "invigorate your page".If you type something in them it won't show on the grounds that the talk you saw was a fake.Another model is an "obby for robux" for the most part individuals join (uninformed individuals) free roblox accounts that work…

There is not a way to get free robux without doing any work, like selling gamepasses and clothing, DO NOT give your password away to a game that claims it will give you a lot of Robux because I promise, they will hack you and change your password. I know from experience, once i had an account with like 10k robux but there was this sponsered game and it looked really interesting so i tried it. It asked for my username and password, so i gave them my roblox username and the same password i used for my roblox account just so i could remember it. I thought mabey it was a game where you made an account to play and save your stuff, but then it said “you have won 1000000000000000 free robux and a Domino Crown!” I got really confused and left the game then i went to bed. the next morning i saw that my account was HACKED. So that is why there is no way to get free robux besides selling game passes etc.

There is no such thing as free Robux. Free Robux would make Roblox shut down. Players buying Robux are the only thing keeping the website and client up and running so that other players enjoy the games. Believe it or not, maintaining a website costs money, and Roblox charges a small price for Robux so that it’s reasonable, yet enough to keep the site up. So this brings me to ask this question: Would you want Roblox free to play with the option of paying for Robux, Make Roblox a large one time purchase so that everyone can access everything (this would be impractical because the price of the game would get up into the tens of thousands), or would you have everything free, but you wouldn’t get to play any games or access the site at all?

So… be very careful about where you go for free robux. There are several scams related to this. I have found a website that did work but I can’t remember what it was. Essentially I would do these surveys for robux. It didn’t always work but most of the time I was able to get some. Never give your password away. No one needs it but you. Most of the items I have on my account is from the Robux I earn by doing those surveys. What is happening here is that you are trading information for a currency. Just be very careful before doing anything and be sure to have the stuff to protect against malware. Edit: If you wanna have a look for proof, my ign is Rhetorical_Save.

Most website that is made for free robux doesn’t work. It’s just fake. If you see a bot or a random group member that dresses with no robux and says “Free robux at blah blah blah,” it’s probably fake. And in YouTube videos, you can see their robux changing, which they only used a feature called “Inspect Element”. That feature can change the look of a website, but it can’t really change the website. For example, you can use it to look like you got 1 million robux, but you won’t be actually granted. It will only go if you refresh the page, and you have to start again. However, some websites do grant you some robux, just saying, so not all free robux websites are bad. Anyway, the easier way is to just buy it with money

The only free way that is legal is if someone owns a group they can give you some through the funding system. Be in mind that this group has to have funds which is earned by selling roblox clothing and then plus to make clothing and a group you need builders club so unless you can find someone that is willing to give you some from there group funds (which the chance of finding someone like that is like 1%) then I would just buy builders club where you get robux daily!

Do you think there is no such thing as free robux ? don’t worry. THERE IS SOME METHODS THAT AREN’T ILLEGAL. Method 1 - Create and sell shirts and pants (requires roblox premium/builders club)Method 2 - Create a game and sell gamepassesMethod 3 - Join robux rafflesMethod 4 - Trade somethings for robux in games like rumble quest,pet simulator etc.If you aren’t able to use any of these methods,you can’t get free robux.

First of all, Robux is not a necessity to survive. In life, technically nothing cannot be earned for free. You must do an action to do this. In this case, it’s getting a job or finding ways to earn the money so you can eventually afford it. You can do survey sites, paper routes and maybe even allowance or chores to do from your neighbours. One thing in the winter you might be able to do if you have the physical strength is to start a service to your neighbours such as shovelling snow on the sidewalk in exchange for some quick cash.

response.answer_text: You cant Everyone on this space asks the same question, "how do I get free robux". Look, Free Robux is not a thing, it does not and cant exist. You cant get money without having a job, that's the principle of real life. Look and remember this phrase: "If it's too good to be true, then it probably is" -me, the wise Robloxian.
